title: Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a player, Torching the main target, Can only be used on night 3, 6, 9 and so on.
- **Ground Pound**: Roleblock all players tonight, Koopas aren't affected by this. (1 use, +1 use after day 5)
